con:testStep.name: Delete the Pet Record using Delete Method

con:restRequest.name: Delete the Pet Record using Delete Method

con:configuration.scriptText: def response = context.expand( '${Delete the Pet Record using Delete Method#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response=="200")
def response = context.expand( '${Delete the Pet Record using Delete Method#Response#$[\'message\']}' ) assert(response!=null)

con:entry.value: ${Verify the updated details using Get Method#Response#$['id']}

con:testStep.name: Verify the Details after deletion using Get Method

con:restRequest.name: Verify the Details after deletion using Get Method

con:configuration.scriptText: def response = context.expand( '${Verify the Details after deletion using Get Method#Response#$[\'message\']}' ) assert(response=="Pet not found")
def response = context.expand( '${Verify the Details after deletion using Get Method#Response#$[\'type\']}' ) assert (response == "error")

con:entry.value: ${Delete the Pet Record using Delete Method#Response#$['message']}

con:property.con:name: AfterDeletion
con:property.con:value: ${Verify the Details after deletion using Get Method#Response#$['message']}

con:configuration.scriptText: def response = context.expand( '${CREATE USER#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response == "200")
def response = context.expand( '${CREATE USER#Response#$[\'message\']}' ) assert(response!=null)
def response = context.expand( '${UpdateUser#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response == "200")
def response = context.expand( '${UpdateUser#Response#$[\'message\']}' ) assert(response!= null)
def response = context.expand( '${Login#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response == "200")
def response = context.expand( '${Login#Response#$[\'message\']}' ) assert(response != null)
def response = context.expand( '${Logout#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response == "200")

def response = context.expand( '${Logout#Response#$[\'message\']}' )
assert(response == "ok")
def response = context.expand( '${DeleteUser#Response#$[\'code\']}' ) assert(response == "200")

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
TestRunListener.afterStep
